title: Clearance certificate for tax arrears - The notice shall also be accompanied by self-certification by the owner/developer regarding payment of tax up to date with certified copies latest payment receipt
clause_text: Clearance certificate for tax arrears - The notice shall also be accompanied by self-certification by the owner/developer regarding payment of tax up to date with certified copies latest payment receipt.
section: Contour plan of site, wherever necessary .
